name: Seek and Destroy (itch)
description:
This game was submitted to Scream Machine 

Seek and Destroy is an atmospheric horror game with a possessed machine that will stop at nothing to destroy you. You must venture through the factory and find keys to advance, while avoiding the machines lurking around the facility. An encounter with the possessed machines could prove to be fatal...

Controls Move ForwardWMove Left
AMove RightDMove BackSLook AroundMouseInteractESprintShiftPauseEsc.Survive?You Don't
